title: Tecno-mobile-skytech (Full-Stack)
points1: ✔️ This project uses JS, React, MongoDB, Node.js, Bootstrap, And FirebaseThis is a complete UI based website.
points2: ✔️ Here you can easily order one or more products and see all the orders if you want. And if you want you can delete orders. If the user wants, he can give a review which will be added to the home page.
points3: ✔️ Admins can add new products if they want and can create more than one admin if they want. And can confirm orders.

title: Unitravel-torism-agency (Full-Stack)
points1: ✔️ This is a complete UI-based website. This project uses JS, React, MongoDB, Node.js, Bootstrap, And Firebase.
points2: ✔️ Different login systems have been provided on this website. If you want you can login in different ways.
points3: ✔️ You can book one or more services if you want. You can view your bookings if you want. And if you want you can delete your bookings.

title: Developing Master (Front-end)
points1: ✔️ This is a different style and design-focused website. This project uses JS, React, Bootstrap, CSS, And Font awesome.
points3: ✔️ Different colors have been given in different places focusing on color combinations.
